title: RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 58 Resident Engineer and Other Posts
description: The Rail India Technical and Economic Services (RITES) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 58 Senior Technical Assistant, Resident Engineer, and Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering can apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply i...
